# Visualization
## libraries
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(caTools)
library(plotly)
library(MASS)
library(matlib)
library(pROC)
library(parallel)
library(CalibrationCurves)
library(caret)
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(papaja)
library(cowplot)
source("R/Functions.R")
```

## plotting 
### all datasets
```{r}
## load data
results_list.50 <- readRDS("data/analysis/experiment 1/data_sim50.rds")
results_list.20 <- readRDS("data/analysis/experiment 1/data_sim20.rds")
results_list.05 <- readRDS("data/analysis/experiment 1/data_sim05.rds")

plot.05 <- create_plot(results_list.05) + theme(legend.position = "none")
plot.20 <- create_plot(results_list.20) + theme(legend.position = "none")
plot.50 <- create_plot(results_list.50)

plot.05
plot.20
plot.50

```


```{r}
### saving
ggsave("results/experiment 1/plot.05.png", plot.05, width = 6.7, height = 6.5, dpi = 600)
ggsave("results/experiment 1/plot.20.png", plot.20, width = 6.7, height = 6.5, dpi = 600)
ggsave("results/experiment 1/plot.50.png", plot.50, width = 9.4, height = 6.5, dpi = 600)
```
